import React from 'react'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import data from '../data'; import Product from '../components/Product'; export default function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.products.fin((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); if (!product){ return
Product Not Found
; } return (

  • {product.name}

  • Price : ${product.price}
    • {/*
  • Description:

    {product.description}

    • */}
  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInstock > 0 ? (In Stock): (Unavailable) }
) }
